Script.Name: Disable useless services
Désactiver les services inutiles
Script.Code: sc config WebClient start= disabled sc config PhoneSvc start= disabled sc config TapiSrv start= disabled sc config Fax start= disabled sc config lfsvc start= disabled sc config RetailDemo start= disabled sc config DiagTrack start= disabled sc config diagnosticshub.standardcollector.service start= disabled sc config WMPNetworkSvc start= disabled sc config shpamsvc start= disabled
